TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描繪的視覺外觀時，就會發生事件變更。The event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn changes. A指定物件，用來繪製的面板，在其中繪製的面板、 面板識別碼、 面板的 [] 和 [面板] 中的狀態資訊來繪製的物件。A specifies the object to use to draw the panel, the object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw. 您可以使用這個類別中的事件處理常式所提供的資料事件，以在您的應用程式中建立自訂繪製的面板控制項。You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，委派，請類別列舉型別和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, the delegate, the class, the enumeration and the property. 若要執行此範例，請將下列的程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得需要繪製。The property enables you to obtain the that needs to be drawn. 您可以使用這項資訊內的事件處理常式事件的控制項上執行的繪製工作。You can use this information within the event handler for the event of a control to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，委派類別，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, the delegate, the class, the , and the property. 若要執行此範例，請將下列的程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
